description: Fix issue where ``--status`` values where not being serialized correctly (`issue 1110 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1110>`__)
Handle broken pipe errors when piping the output to another program (`issue 1113 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/1113>`__)
Fix issue where ``aws s3/s3api`` commands would hang when using an HTTP proxy (`issue 1116 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/issues/1116>`__)
Add waiters for the ``aws elasticache wait`` (`botocore issue 443 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/pull/443>`__)
Fix issue when Mac OS X has an ``LC_CTYPE`` value of ``UTF-8`` (`issue 945 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/issues/945>`__)
